text: Wesley Sneijder (born 9 June 1984) is a Dutch retired football player. He played for clubs such as Real Madrid, Ajax, Inter Milan, and Galatasaray. He also played for the Netherlands national team, and he has been called one of the best midfielders of all time. He played in the 2010 FIFA World Cup Final, and was one of the top scorers of that tournament. == Personal life == Sneijder became a Roman Catholic in 2010. Sneijder has two sons and two brothers: Jeffrey and Rodney.
